sentences.sContent: If we got an if then statement are we asserting an antecedent, an if clause or the consequent, Q the then clause, or are we saying if P then Q.
sentences.sContent_eng: If we got an if then statement are we asserting an antecedent, an if clause or the consequent, Q the then clause, or are we saying if P then Q.
sentences.sCn: 如果我们的论述中有如果,我们在主张先行词，假设条件句或者结果，然后从句，或者我们说如果P那么。

synos.tran: 随之发生的；作为结果的

words.tran: 间接的；结果的；重要的；随之发生的；自傲的

trans.tranCn: 随之发生的；作为结果的
trans.tranOther: happening as a result of a particular event or situation
